comment: Yelling Jew and nigger at anyone standing against globalism is not going to save Western Civilization. I'm no fan of Kanye and suspect his motives, but I welcome ANY black person smart enough to stand against the left's lies about racism.
amr:
# ::snt Yelling Jew and nigger at anyone standing against globalism is not going to save Western Civilization. I'm no fan of Kanye and suspect his motives, but I welcome ANY black person smart enough to stand against the left's lies about racism.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (s / save-02
            :polarity -
            :ARG0 (a / and
                  :op1 (t / tell-01
                        :ARG1 (a2 / and
                              :op1 (j / Jew)
                              :op2 (n / nigger))
                        :ARG2 (a3 / anyone
                              :ARG0-of (s2 / stand-11
                                    :ARG1 (o / oppose-01
                                          :ARG1 (g / globalism))))))
            :ARG1 (c / civilize-01
                  :ARG1 (w / world-region
                        :name (n2 / name
                              :op1 "West"))))
      :snt2 (c2 / contrast-01
            :ARG1 (a4 / and
                  :op1 (f / fan
                        :polarity -
                        :domain (ii / i)
                        :topic (p / person
                              :name (n3 / name
                                    :op1 "Kanye")))
                  :op2 (s3 / suspect-01
                        :ARG0 ii
                        :ARG1 (m2 / motive
                              :poss p)))
            :ARG2 (w2 / welcome-01
                  :ARG0 ii
                  :ARG1 (p2 / person
                        :ARG1-of (b / black-05)
                        :mod (a5 / any)
                        :ARG1-of (h / have-degree-91
                              :ARG2 (s4 / smart-06
                                    :ARG1 p2)
                              :ARG3 (e / enough)
                              :ARG6 (s5 / stand-11
                                    :ARG0 p2
                                    :ARG1 (o2 / oppose-01
                                          :ARG0 p2
                                          :ARG1 (l / lie-08
                                                :ARG0 (l2 / left-19)
                                                :ARG3 (r / racism)))))))))

comment: Use of the slurs here is unacceptable in our discourse as it demeans and insults and alienates others.
amr:
# ::snt Use of the slurs here is unacceptable in our discourse as it demeans and insults and alienates others.
(p / possible-01
      :polarity -
      :ARG1 (a / accept-01
            :ARG1 (u / use-01
                  :ARG1 (s / slur)
                  :location (h / here))
            :location (d / discourse-01
                  :ARG0 (w / we)))
      :ARG1-of (c / cause-01
            :ARG0 (a2 / and
                  :op1 (d2 / demean-01
                        :ARG0 u
                        :ARG1 (a3 / and
                              :op1 (ii / insult-01
                                    :ARG0 u
                                    :op2-of a3)
                              :ARG0 u)))
            :op2 (a4 / alienate-01
                  :ARG0 u
                  :ARG1 (o / other))))

comment: no need to label people black or white etc. we are all humans and all came from africa at some point. lets leave it
amr:
# ::snt no need to label people black or white etc. we are all humans and all came from africa at some point. lets leave it
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (n / need-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG1 (l / label-01
                  :ARG1 (p / person)
                  :ARG2 (o / or
                        :op1 (b / black-05)
                        :op2 (w / white-02)
                        :op3 (e / et-cetera))))
      :snt2 (a / and
            :op1 (h / human
                  :domain (w2 / we
                        :mod (a2 / all)))
            :op2 (c / come-01
                  :ARG1 w2
                  :ARG3 (c2 / continent
                        :name (n2 / name
                              :op1 "Africa"))
                  :time (p2 / point
                        :mod (s / some))))
      :snt3 (l2 / leave-15
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 w2)
      :ARG1 (ii / it))

comment: What would help Western Civilization is if we stop worrying about race

                  :ARG1 w))
      :ARG1 (c / civilize-01

                        :op1 "West"))))
